item.description:
Lets all get out and have some fun, dancing to the tunes of "The Classmates" they play tunes to the 70's, 80's and 90's, I have heard them before and they are a very popular band that have been in and around New England for quite some time, I guarantee you they will get the place hopping. The dance floor here is huge, excellant Italian menu, service is great and plenty of parking space. Whether it be just dancing or grabbing a bite to eat join in and bring a smile along..:-}

Band starts at 9 pm

Put in your reply if coming for dinner thanks

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner, Drinks, Dancing to The Classmates
